title: Beer
creator_credit: Denis Harvey, Martin Didsbury and Television New Zealand
brief_description: Presents an examination of beer production. Indicates the processing stages, and the resulting outputs of products, by-products and wastes. Chemical processes in fermentation are also considered. The program lends itself to students developing a flow chart of the manufacturing system, with inputs of various values, quantities and types.
